question: 征服
sourceMnemonic: I will <kanji>subjugate</kanji> everyone to wear the <kanji>clothes</kanji> I want them to wear. They will wear my uniform, for they will be under my <vocabulary>subjugation</vocabulary>. I will <vocabulary>conquest</vocabulary> them!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
